page.title: 08FOOD & KITCHEN APPLIANCES
page.content:
In our home economics class we discussed the food we eat at home and discovered that many of the dishes we like come from other countries. Our mums make{Italian}spaghetti, pizza, bolognese and lasagne. From{India}we enjoy pork tandoori, curried chicken, and chapatis. Gillian likes chilli con carne as eaten in{Mexico.}Beefburgers from {America}are another popular food amongst children. We all, however, still love{British}fish and chips.
In J10 we took a survey of how much we rely on electrical gadgets in our home to make life easier and to provide us with entertainment. The results are on page 9.
